snippet: Stephen Strasburg (6-1) threw seven scoreless innings for the first time as Washington remained alone in first place in the National League East.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Washington Nationals defeat Atlanta Braves, 2-0, behind stellar pitching from Nationals ace Stephen Strasburg; other MLB scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Strasburg (6-1) threw seven scoreless innings for the first time as Washington remained alone in first place in the National League East.

headline.seo: Strasburg Keeps Nationals Alone in First
headline.main: Strasburg Keeps Nationals Alone in First
headline.print_headline: Strasburg Shackles Braves for Seven Innings and Keeps the Nationals Alone in First
